name: InterContinental Hotels Real San Salvador

reviews.text: I am a frequent traveler and I had some issues with this hotel, most of which are not worth detailing - but, along with some good experiences I left here feeling neutral.
reviews.title: Good and not so good
Great Hotel
reviews.text: There is a shuttle bus service from the airport, which is quite convenient. I believe it was $10 each way. It's quite a haul from the airport to the hotel, so I recommend it (rather than taking your chances on an airport taxi).

aka: Intercontinental Hotels Real San Salvador Hotel
description: Our luxury hotel is located in the heart of the city's thriving entertainment and business centres. Adjacent to one of Central America's largest shopping malls and with easy access to the airport. All our rooms have been newly renovated and include soundproof windows, high speed WiFi 24MB, customized mattresses and more. Enjoy our wide selection of restaurants such as; Faisca- authentic Brazilian flair, Picasso- Mediterranean flavored cuisine and NAU Lounge, our trendy and vibrant bar.
